page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: LIFESTYLES 2-A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ADAM On Monday we wake at 7.I go into Mummy's bed for a cuddle.At 7.30 we get up.Mummy gets washed while we get dressed.When Mummy's dressed my sister has her hair plaited.We go downstairs,at 8o'clock we have breakfast and do our homework;after that we clean our teeth and wash our faces. We go to school at 8.30;the bell goes at 9.At half past three we go home. At 6 I go to cubs,at 8 I come home from cubs.I tell Mummy and Daddy what I did,then I go to bed.Mummy reads us a story in bed. My Mummy does the housework while I'm at school.Daddy goes to Haslemere station at 6 o'clock in the morning to catch a train to London;he comes back about 7 o'clock at night.
